login.title: Sign in to {{productName}}
login.subtitle: Revisit AI-generated tasks, review transcript highlights, and keep your delivery boards in sync.

errors.passwordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.

alerts.verificationBody: We sent a verification email to {{email}}. Please verify your email and then sign in.

links.signup: Don't have an account? Sign Up

legal.agreePrefix: By signing in, you agree to our

signUp.title: Create your {{productName}} workspace
signUp.subtitle: Let AI map every conversation into tasks, priorities, and delivery boards your team trusts.

links.loginPrompt: Already have an account? Sign In

home.heading: Welcome back
home.subheading: Your AI workspace — sessions, tasks, slides, and chat, all in one place.

newSession.title: New session
newSession.description: Upload a transcript and generate tasks automatically with AI.

createSlides.title: Create slides
createSlides.description: Generate a branded presentation from any prompt or context.

chat.title: AI chat
chat.description: Chat with your sessions, contexts, and workspace knowledge.

contexts.title: Manage contexts
contexts.description: Upload files and documents to enrich AI-generated content.

emptyState.title: Your workspace is ready
emptyState.description: Start by creating a session to process a transcript, or jump straight into generating an AI slide deck.

transcripts.title: Recent transcripts
transcripts.subtitle: Latest uploads from {{session}}
transcripts.empty: No transcripts yet. Upload the first conversation to generate action items.

tasks.title: Priority tasks
tasks.subtitle: Pulled from {{session}}
tasks.empty: No tasks yet. Upload or create a transcript to generate follow-up items.

profile.heading: Profile
profile.description: Manage your Plan AI account and workspace footprint.

alerts.refreshError: We could not refresh your profile details. Cached information is shown below.

sections.workspaceDescription: Transcript ingestion, AI task suggestions, and custom themes are tied to this profile. A full delete removes all associated boards and artifacts.

integrations.error: Unable to load integrations right now.

errors.deleteAccount: Unable to delete your account. Please try again.

sidebar.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this chat? This action cannot be undone.

placeholders.selectChat: Select a chat from the sidebar or start a new one
placeholders.emptyStateSubtitle: Chat with your codebase or documentation using Plan AI.

dialog.title: Select Contexts
dialog.description: Choose which contexts the AI should reference for this chat.
dialog.noContexts: You haven't created any contexts yet. Contexts allow the AI to answer based on your documents.

contexts.heading: Contexts
contexts.description: Manage knowledge spaces that power your AI-assisted planning. Keep them organized with files, metadata, and colors.

list.label: YOUR CONTEXTS
list.emptyDescription: Contexts serve as knowledge bases for your AI. By uploading documents (PDFs, text files, etc.) to a Context, you enable the AI to provide answers grounded in your specific data. Create one above to get started.
list.error: Failed to load contexts. Please refresh the page.

placeholders.selectContext: Select a context from the list to see its details.
placeholders.missingDescription: No description provided for this context.
placeholders.noFiles: No files uploaded yet. Upload documents, spreadsheets, or other resources to this context.

messages.createError: Failed to create context. Please try again.
messages.updateError: Failed to update context. Please try again.
messages.uploadError: Failed to upload file. Please try again.
messages.deleteError: Failed to delete file. Please try again.
messages.contextError: Failed to load context. Please try refreshing the page.

integrationsPage.heading: Integrations
integrationsPage.description: Connect external tools to streamline how Plan AI syncs tasks and project updates.
integrationsPage.notSignedIn: You must be signed in to manage integrations.

statusAlert.error: Failed to complete integration. Please try again.

errors.jiraAuthStart: Unable to start Jira authorization. Please try again.
errors.jiraAuthFlow: Failed to initiate Jira OAuth flow. Please retry.

integrationsPage.comingSoonFallback: {{provider}} integration is coming soon. Stay tuned!

jira.label: Jira
jira.description: Connect your Atlassian Jira Cloud account to sync projects and push action items directly to Jira boards.
jira.comingSoonMessage: Jira integration is coming soon. Stay tuned!

linear.label: Linear
linear.description: Connect your Linear workspace to manage product issues and tasks alongside Plan AI sessions.
linear.comingSoonMessage: Linear integration is coming soon. Stay tuned!

hero.title: From meeting to done — in seconds
hero.subtitle: Plan AI turns transcripts into tasks, kanban boards, AI-generated slide decks, and contextual chat. The entire delivery stack, powered by AI.

features.heading: Everything your team needs, nothing it doesn't
features.subheading: One platform that takes your raw meeting output and turns it into structured, actionable work.

transcript.title: Transcript intake
transcript.description: Drop raw meeting transcripts or notes. Plan AI auto-detects speakers, decisions, and action items in seconds.

tasks.title: AI task generation
tasks.description: Generate scoped, prioritized tasks with owners, due dates, and full meeting context — zero manual effort.

boards.title: Boards & timelines
boards.description: Switch between kanban, dependency diagrams, and roadmap views to keep every project aligned.

slides.title: AI slide decks
slides.description: Generate beautiful, branded presentations from any prompt or context — choose your theme and let AI do the rest.

chat.title: Contextual AI chat
chat.description: Ask questions about your sessions, tasks, and context files. Your AI assistant knows your entire workspace.

insights.title: Delivery insights
insights.description: Spot blockers early with dependency tracking, burn-up reports, and stakeholder digests.

1.title: Connect & upload
1.description: Sign in with Google or email. Upload meeting transcripts or context files to give Plan AI the full picture.

2.title: Let AI do the work
2.description: Plan AI extracts tasks, builds boards, and generates slides automatically. No templates to fill, no config to touch.

3.title: Ship faster
3.description: Review, adjust, and push tasks to Jira or Linear. Share slide decks. Chat with your context. Stay unblocked.

checklist.allInOne: Tasks, slides & chat in one place

cta.title: Stop cleaning up meeting notes
cta.subtitle: Join teams using Plan AI to cut planning overhead and ship faster. It takes 30 seconds to get started.

sessionDetails.subtitle: Review session metadata and track its status.

sections.tasksOverviewDescription: Visualise work with a kanban board or dependency diagram. Session details and transcripts live in the info page.

messages.noTasks: No tasks yet. Create tasks to populate the board.
messages.deleteError: Failed to delete task. Please try again.

deleteTask.title: Delete task
deleteTask.description: Deleting this task will remove it from the session and unlink any dependencies.

sections.transcriptsDescription: Review captured transcripts and their metadata.

messages.noTranscripts: No transcripts have been captured for this session yet.

deleteAccountDialog.title: Confirm account deletion
deleteAccountDialog.description: This will permanently remove your Plan AI account, including transcript history, generated tasks, and custom themes. This action cannot be undone.
deleteAccountDialog.confirmPrompt: To continue, confirm you want to delete the account associated with:

forgotPassword.heading: Reset your {{productName}} access
forgotPassword.description: Enter the email tied to your workspace and we'll send steps to get you back to your transcript-driven boards.
forgotPassword.success: If an account exists with this email, you will receive password reset instructions shortly.

SECRETARY.name: Secretary
SECRETARY.description: Extreme precision. Only extract tasks explicitly mentioned. No technical generation.

ARCHITECT.name: Architect
ARCHITECT.description: Technical decomposition. Breakdown high-level goals into detailed technical tasks using codebase context.

PRODUCT_MANAGER.name: Product Manager
PRODUCT_MANAGER.description: Stakeholder lens. Turn goals into user stories, roadmap items, and feature sets.

DEVELOPER.name: Developer
DEVELOPER.description: Implementation focused. Create specific coding, testing, and refactoring tasks.

fields.title: Title
fields.objectivePlaceholder: e.g. Create 3 critical tasks for the login flow changes...
fields.contentPlaceholder: Paste or type transcript text here

messages.selectFileError: Please select at least one PDF or DOCX file to upload.
messages.unsupportedError: Only PDF and DOCX files are supported.
messages.contentError: Please provide either transcript content or an objective.
messages.processingWait: We are extracting text and analyzing your transcript with AI. This may take a moment for larger files.

slides.title: Slides
slides.catalogSubtitle: Browse available slide types and preview them

themes.title: Themes
themes.empty: No themes yet. Create one to get started.
themes.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this theme?

create.title: Create Presentation
create.subtitle: Choose a theme and describe what you want. The AI will decide the structure, slide count, and content.
create.contextsHelper: Select contexts to enrich the presentation with your data via RAG
create.titleHelper: Leave empty and the AI will generate one
create.prompt: What should this presentation be about?
create.promptPlaceholder: e.g., Create a project status update with team overview, Q1 metrics, and next quarter roadmap
create.error: Failed to generate presentation. Please try again.
create.selectThemePrompt: Select a theme to see a preview
create.numSlidesHelper: Leave on AI decides to let the AI choose the ideal slide count (max 15)
